data.title: Missouri Counties by Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Get a list of Missouri counties by population based on Census 2023 data.
data.text:
The most populated counties in Missouri are St. Louis County with 987,059, Jackson County at 718,560, St. Charles County with 416,659, Greene County at 304,611, and St. Louis city/county with 281,754. You can get the most current Census population data for all 115 Missouri counties, sorted from the most populous counties in Missouri to the least, according to the 2023 Population Estimates Program.

Sure, you can copy this list right into your favorite spreadsheet tool. Or save yourself formatting headaches and grab the latest Missouri counties population data as a ready-to-use Excelâ„¢ file below. It's time to stop searching and start digging into data!
